Detailed Description

template<class DataConfig, class SynMechConfig, class PlastMechConfig>
class ConcreteSynapseFactory< DataConfig, SynMechConfig, PlastMechConfig >

ConcreteSynapseFactory:.

Class template with real configurators (DataConfig, SynMechConfig, PlastMechConfig). These classes are called by SynapseFactory to effectively build the actual synapses according to the mechanisms.
